author: Gary Raymond
comment: Has crashed a couple of times in the past. Hopefully is/will get more reliable as really like the way phone and watch battery needles 'fall' down to zero and very easy to read time. Only wish I could have the date on the same line as month and year as I can't read the small date circle with my old eyes ::-(

For us +300m Americans, it would be nice to have the 12hr display option. Also, periodically reports a crash dialogue box on my smartphone (why is the app running on my smartphone?). Beautiful design though, one of the best looking watch faces. Hope these issues get addressed!
title: Missing 12hr Display

author: Terry. B.
comment: SO TIRED OF 17 FORCE CLOSES EACH DAY !!!!!!! Guys : I've notified you of this last month and you Still haven't fixed this. 1 Star until Fixed THEN am Easy 5 * watch face! I'm Sick and Tired of telling you this Multiple Times Each and Every day.

author: Weesli 7
comment: This watch face is great, would use it more often if it had a 12 hour option, but why oh God why does it need to crash every half hour, it's insane and really gets in the way of me trying to use my phone...
title: Beautiful, but GOD THE CRASHES

author: Marquise Williams
comment: I have reported this app several times and there has been no fix to it. So, I uninstalled it. If it worked properly, it would be a nice watch face to have on my Nexus 6.
title: Constantly stops working

author: Adebayo Adetunji
comment: This looks very beautiful and classy on my Sony smartwatch 3. Has worked well for me so far. Did get a couple of crash reports on my phone but when I looked at the watch face, it was still working fine.
title: Best watch face so far!

author: Erkan Ersoy
comment: Really...really love this watch face but unfortunately it keeps crashing at least 6 times a day. Would have given it 5 stars otherwise. Will be happy to revise rating once the crash issue is rectified.

author: Christopher Paris
comment: Crash warnings pop up every hour or so even when the face isn't set. Maddening. Too bad because it is a beautiful design.
title: Gorgeous but crashes constantly

author: William Somar
comment: Runs in background when not selected as current watch. Crashes several times a day. Nice graphics but unreliable. UPDATE - Gave it another try a year later. Does not work with AndroidWear 2.0. App still crashes in background. (Just now while I was writing this)

author: Steve Henricksen
comment: My favorite design. But the app crashes are insane... Please work on stability and adding features, step counter. If improved and features added i would be happy to pay for this app. Thanks

author: Dirk Purfurst
comment: I have a Nexus 6P and I am not even using this watch face right now but it keeps crashing.
title: Keeps Crashing

author: Daniel Follweiler
comment: But it isn't worth the hassle of constant crashes since the latest update. I didn't use the face enough to justify putting up with this. Uninstalling
title: The watchface is okay

author: Jaidee King
comment: Why in the world would you make a digital watch face without a 12 hr option? Also its been crashing ALOT.
title: Good watch face but...

author: Peter Scott
comment: Uninstalled due to constant crashes. Can't help any more because no information is ever offered in the notification
title: Uninstalled

author: Salvador Salinas
comment: This is one of my favorites watch faces, but it keeps crashing on my Nexus 6p, I'll wait a few days and see it it gets updated.
title: Very nice, keeps crushing

author: Kurt von Wasmuth
comment: This is a great looking watch face and works like a charm but it really is crying out for a 12 hour option.
title: Neat idea!

author: Heckies
comment: Needs a lot of love and attention before being replaced.  Fix the problems,  then I'll change the score.
title: Could be better

author: Rich Szczepanski
comment: My phone (Nexus 6p) keeps telling me the watchface crashed. Not worth the hassle.
title: Nice but crashes....

author: Robert Ion
comment: However please optimize it for lg g watch r which has a p-oled display and needs to have a burn in protection in standby. If you do this I will update the rating accordingly. Thanks you in advance.

reply.author: MobiDev Studio
reply.content:
Hi Robert
Thanks for the feedback and sorry for the inconvenience! We will do this optimization for lg r watch in later version. Stay tuned!
Thanks

title: Nice watchface

author: Jason McCracken
comment: LG G4 + Moto360, never worked, just constant pop ups telling me it had crashed...
title: Constant Crashes

author: Dylan Campbell
comment: This needs a 12 hour option so desperately. The 24 hour only kills this watch face for me.
title: No 12 hour option?

author: Mike R
comment: My favorite watch until it turns to 1:00pm... I mean 13:00.  Would love the 12 hour option.  Still a 5 star watch face regardless!
title: 12 hour option please

author: Ceri Jones
comment: Really like the face when the watch is live but on ambient/rest mode, rather than have the dials frozen, just have a black background, displaying only the month/year, time, and day in white.
title: Nice face but

author: Abdullah Kamran
comment: Crashing on the phone every few hours even if it is not used as watch face. Un installing

reply.author: MobiDev Studio
reply.content:
Hi Abdullah
Thanks for your feedback and 5-star review. We will keep working on this job and make more better watch faces!

Thanks!

author: mkeys7
comment: Needs a 12 hour option.  Also keep getting message about crashing
title: Love the design... But

author: H. Mob
comment: I understand it's free, looks great but it would be nice to have the option of military time or 12 format.
title: Good watch face, room for improvement

author: Robbie Jardine
comment: Any chance u can fix this app to stop is crashing all the time?
title: Needs fixed

author: Wesley Luce
comment: Wish I had a way of changing the seconds hand to tempature or turning it off. It also needs to be able to change from 24hr time.
title: Looks great.

author: Duane Wilkins
comment: Unfortunately it crashes on my phone so often it necessary to uninstall
title: Great concept

author: Anand Gona
comment: Works pretty well on Moto 360 2. Been rocking it since couple of weeks. No crashes so far.
title: Good face!

author: Javier Chang
comment: It keeps crashing. Cannot access page to modify watch face
title: Crashes

author: First Baptist Church of Dowling Park
comment: Great face but constantly crashing. Uninstalled.
title: Not good

author: Mitchell Vanderlei
comment: don't like getting "crystal watch face stopped working" every 20 min even when my watch isn't with me.
title: I do like the watch face

author: Ernesto Ortega
comment: It would be 5 stars if not for that
title: Love the design, needs 12hr option

author: Yury H
comment: Could you add an option to switch to 12hr AM/PM clock and remove (or slim down) the digital bezel all around?
title: Looks great!

author: Homer Simpson
comment: Great watch face, apart from the continued crashing. Fix that and its a 5 star app

author: Darren F
comment: Doesn't look good on square watches. Polar m600

author: Giovani M
comment: It's beautiful, but needs a better stand by version, more dark mainly.
title: Very cool

author: Ariel Yahni
comment: Latest version keeps crashing.  No bueno
title: Crashhhh

author: Kristen Moore
comment: Really desiring a 12 hour option.
title: Looks good!
